title: PNPM create creates a project with outdated packages
body:
### Describe the bug

`pnpm create` creates a project with outdated packages, this is easily solved with a `pnpm update` but I thought I should report it here as it is something I haven't seen before. (Junior programmer BTW, so I don't know whether it is a regular thing)

### Reproduction

Run `pnpm create svelte@latest [project]`

### Logs

```Shell
Packages: +235
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
Packages are hard linked from the content-addressable store to the virtual store.
  Content-addressable store is at: /home/shindrad/.local/share/pnpm/store/v3
  Virtual store is at:             node_modules/.pnpm
Progress: resolved 278, reused 222, downloaded 13, added 235, done
node_modules/.pnpm/svelte-preprocess@5.0.3_postcss@8.4.23_svelte@3.54.0_typescript@4.9.5/node_modules/svelte-preprocess: Running postinode_modules/.pnpm/svelte-preprocess@5.0.3_postcss@8.4.23_svelte@3.54.0_typescript@4.9.5/node_modules/svelte-preprocess: Running postinstall script, done in 38ms
node_modules/.pnpm/esbuild@0.17.18/node_modules/esbuild: Running postinstall script, done in 87ms
node_modules/.pnpm/@sveltejs+kit@1.5.0_svelte@3.54.0_vite@4.3.0/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit: Running postinstall script, done in 1.7s

devDependencies:
+ @playwright/test 1.28.1 (1.32.3 is available)

+ tslib 2.4.1 (2.5.0 is available)

    Memory: 1.19 GB / 3.73 GB

### Severity

### Additional Information

_No response_
